description:
A simple, open-source app for setting recurring reminders throughout your day. reReminder helps you stay focused and mindful with simple, recurring notifications. Whether you need a nudge to correct your posture, take a break, or practice mindfulness, reReminder has you covered.

Features:
  • Customizable Intervals: Set reminders for any interval, from minutes to hours.
  • Flexible Notifications: Choose between a standard notification sound or have the reminder text read aloud with Text-to-Speech.
  • Personalized Alerts: Customize the notification title, text, and vibration pattern to fit your needs.
  • Simple Interface: A clean, intuitive interface built with Jetpack Compose makes setting up reminders effortless.
  • Dark Mode: The app respects your system's theme for comfortable use in any lighting.
